import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const Posts = (props) => { const [like, setLike] = useState(false) const [comment, setComment] = useState(false) const [share, setShare] = useState(false) const [follow,setFollow] = useState(false) const likeHandler = () => { setLike(!like) console.log('user liked your post') props.socket.emit('sendNotificati') } const commentHandler = () => { setComment(!comment) console.log('user commented on your post') } const shareHandler =()=>{ setShare(!share) console.log('user shared your post') } const followHandler = () =>{ setFollow(!follow) console.log('user follows you') } return (
{follow? : }
{like ? : } {comment ? : } {share? : }
) } export default Posts
